overview:
Rich Petersen is director of software marketing for the FlashSoft product line at SanDisk Enterprise Storage Solutions.

Rich has led enterprise software marketing and strategy at a number of successful Silicon Valley startups. Rich was previously VP of Marketing at software provider FlashSoft (acquired by SanDisk). Rich served as VP of Marketing at LogicBlaze, a provider of open source integration solutions (acquired by IONA Technologies). As VP of Product Marketing at Infravio, Rich helped launch the pioneering developer of Web Services and SOA solutions (acquired by WebMethods, now part of Software AG). Rich was also a startup executive with Interwoven, an early leader in Web content management, where he built the company’s original marketing team and led the company’s startup marketing effort. Rich also worked at Insignia Solutions, where he led product management and distribution for Asia-Pacific and Latin America.
